Interface UsageTarget

    Navigatable, NavigationItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends NavigationItem

        void findUsages()
        Should open usage view and look for usages

      • findUsagesInEditor

        default void findUsagesInEditor(FileEditor editor)
        Should look for usages in one specific editor. This typicaly shows other kind of dialog and doesn't result in usage view display.

      • getFiles

        default VirtualFile [] getFiles()
        Returns:
        the files this usage target is in. Might be null if usage target is not file-based
